casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
ACOSTA S235773 Supreme Court of California August 17, 2012 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Werdegar, Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related issue in People v. Valenzuela, S232900 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court Submission of additional briefing pursuant to California Rules of Court rule 8.520 is deferred pending further order of the court.
